Posts.EditableText:
<details>
Just to clarify, my list are mostly on new games and easy to play games, hence the strange title name: Some games I like.

If you are interested in making a different list like a list of difficult parser games or detective games, it would be interesting to see that too.
</details>

________

https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/tasncqqsuuyrmln94ojphg/the-test-is-now-ready

Posts.HTML:
Just to clarify, my list are mostly on new games and easy to play games, hence the strange title name: Some games I like.

If you are interested in making a different list like a list of difficult parser games or detective games, it would be interesting to see that too.

January

The Test is Now READY by Jim Warrenfeltz
https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/tasncqqsuuyrmln94ojphg/the-test-is-now-ready
